plot: In the Cameroon village of Koundi, the inhabitants have established a "national Thursday". Once day a month, they will work on creating a cocoa plantation. Village life through the prism of self-management.
title: Koundi et le Jeudi national
plot_es: In the Cameroon village of Koundi, the inhabitants have established a "national Thursday". Once day a month, they will work on creating a cocoa plantation. Village life through the prism of self-management.
plot_en: In the Cameroon village of Koundi, the inhabitants have established a "national Thursday". Once day a month, they will work on creating a cocoa plantation. Village life through the prism of self-management.
